title: Govt issues notices to auto majors seeking old GST dues
description: The central government has issued notices to major automakers for unpaid Goods and Services Tax (GST) dues related to compensation cess on sold vehicles. Automakers are asking the government to reconsider these notices.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
